long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vimium style predictable keyboard navigation mapper.

Features:
* Predictable hint keys generation. Wayfarer will always generate the same hint keys for the same websites.
* Hint keys are generated by the special algorithm which will always generate the one letter key hints first.
* Supports multi-key hints and opening links in a new tab.
* Supports different color hint marks for different elements. Yellow hint marks represent actionable links and buttons, while green hint marks represent focus-able inputs.
* Requires minimal permissions from the users. We do not store or log ANY kind of user information.
